titleStmt.title: Jonas Redux, or, A divine warning-piece shot from the fort-royal of Ninive to all cities, countreys, kingdoms and empires to exhort them to be careful how they do admit of the dominion of sin within their respective territories, lest they fall into the like danger / Jonas Anglicus.
titleStmt.author: Janson, Henry, Sir, 1616 or 17-ca. 1684.

titleStmt.title: Jonas Redux, or, A divine warning-piece shot from the fort-royal of Ninive to all cities, countreys, kingdoms and empires to exhort them to be careful how they do admit of the dominion of sin within their respective territories, lest they fall into the like danger / Jonas Anglicus.
titleStmt.author: Janson, Henry, Sir, 1616 or 17-ca. 1684.

notesStmt.note: Latin and English on opposing pages.
